content.prompt: Complete this function according to its docstring description.
content.source_code:
[student_code]
def upper_lower(s):
    """ (str) -> bool
    
    Return True if and only if there is at least one alphabetic character in s and the alphabetic characters in s
    are either all uppercase or all lowercase.
    
    >>> upper_lower('abc')
    True
    >>> upper_lower('abcXYZ')
    False
    >>> upper_lower('XYZ')
    True
    """
[/student_code]
